subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: With all the energy she had, Amy Begley ran a furious last half lap and made the Olympic team, beating the time standard for the 10,000 meters by only 1.4 seconds.
snippet: With all the energy she had, Amy Begley ran a furious last half lap and made the Olympic team, beating the time standard for the 10,000 meters by only 1.4 seconds.
